content.html:
Ravi Pandya

Freelance Senior Content Writer AT Semrush

Ravi is a data-driven content marketer, writer, and strategist with over 10 years of marketing experience. He helps B2B SaaS companies drive organic growth with product-led content and SEO.

Expertise
  • content strategy
  • content writing
  • seo
  • product marketing
  • market research and analysis
Education
  • London Metropolitan University
    Master of Business Administration (MBA)

Author

Fresh content is newly created or updated content. It matters most when it’s relevant to timely queries.
